name: Run from the unstable stable
description:
You are Farmer (that's his real name). 

While you were tending to your turtle and your big flying blue capsule (a very rare species of bird, very valuable), an earthquake hit the whole solar system. 

Your must run through your now falling apart stable while collecting as many animals as possible !

An original idea by Alexandra Goeman.

TEAM :
Programmer : Raphael Da Costa ; 3D Artists : Killian Diakouka and Antoine Torrecillas.
